mapper.update: update user_account set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, validate = #{validate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify = #{modify,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, account, password, nickname, picture, email, phone, validate, version, modify, modify_time, user_id from user_account where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, account, password, nickname, picture, email, phone, validate, version, modify, modify_time, user_id from user_account
